C

Camera - Class in renderer
The Camera class represents a virtual camera used for rendering images through ray tracing.
Camera(Point, Vector, Vector) - Constructor for class renderer.Camera
Constructs a camera with the specified position and orientation.
checkSign(double, double) - Static method in class primitives.Util
Checks whether two numbers have the same sign.
Circle - Class in geometries
The Circle class represents a two-dimensional circle in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Circle(Point, double, Vector) - Constructor for class geometries.Circle
Constructs a Circle given its center, radius, and an orthogonal unit vector (normal).
Color - Class in primitives
Wrapper class for java.awt.Color.
Color(double, double, double) - Constructor for class primitives.Color
Constructor to generate a color according to RGB components Each component in range 0..255 (for printed white color) or more [for lights]
Color(Color) - Constructor for class primitives.Color
Constructor based on a java.awt.Color object.
constructRay(int, int, int, int) - Method in class renderer.Camera
Constructs a ray passing through a specific pixel on the view plane.
constructRayS(int, int, int, int) - Method in class renderer.Camera
Antialiasing Function for calculating that a list of rays intersects the pixel
constructRaySSuperSampling(double, double, Point) - Method in class renderer.Camera
 
crossProduct(Vector) - Method in class primitives.Vector
Calculates the cross product of two vectors.
Cylinder - Class in geometries
The Cylinder class represents a three-dimensional cylinder in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder(Ray, double, double) - Constructor for class geometries.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder with the given axis ray, radius, and height.
